EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal CNY Celebration Lunch @ Wah Lok 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to attend the Pivotal CNY Celebration Lunch @ Wah Loh 01 Feb 2019. We are delighted to host you and looking forward to our next get together.
Attaching the photos here for your download: https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipNtGPoEjhu0ZgQ5fDItLGruNvac0BNLSaHqpRL9JcKqWMwKJluQufzbCbzSgnEEtQ?key=UmJOOXVOLTdqWG9lX1BjV2lzT2I5M0htby0tLXl3
Regards,
I-Pin Chua General Manager, South Asia Pivotal
